summary: The overview highlights the evolving concept of ecosystems, moving from biological constraints to modern, decentralized forms that transcend geographic boundaries. Ecosystem architecture, inspired by diverse fields, aims to foster innovative, non-hierarchical structures and regenerative practices on the internet. The tag encompasses discussions on the future of design, biology, and decentralized systems.
excerpt: Biological ecosystems are defined by space and time, but modern ecosystems transcend these. Ecosystem architecture proposes decentralized, non-hierarchical structures inspired by diverse disciplines.
